reviews.sentence: overall a good hotel choice location. The evening buffet was to die for but if you have not been to Singapore before you might think it is s little expensive. Wifi was good with strong bandwidth Very clean hotel throughout. There is not much not to like unles the prices of drinks and food might bother you but it is par for the course in Singapore which is a lovely place. At least the taxis are cheap and readily available at the entrance all the time.

Enjoyable stay. Check in experience was delightful with helpful and efficient front desk manager Lyn. Housekeeping service acted very promptly to my every request. Wide selection of fresh and tasty dishes for breakfast buffet. Needed to queue shortly to be seated for breakfast as there were not enough seats.

Good property with great hospitality. Great location great service and good quality room. My room was clean very comfy and spacious l love the breakfast in the lounge. Did nt get chance to try the hors doeuvres though but the lounge is lovely. Staffs were helpful and efficient. There was a long que when i check out the other day as i have found my apartment that is near to my office. Ms. Kate was very polite no matter how busy she was she still wore a sweet smile and apologised for keeping the guest waiting. She even remember my name and my room number. Very impressive. After my check out. Lewis assisted me to carry my luggage and to get me a cab. All in all this is a fantastic hotel.

Second Time Still Good. This is the second time we have stayed at this hotel. This time it was following a cruise. The previous time was in 206 on our way to England. Nothing appears to have changed in the interim. I would have no problems staying here again if we ever had the need to stay in Singapore again. The reception on arrival was slow as most reception seem to be. However the staff there were courteous and the service provided was good. When during our overnight stay I could not manage to login to the free wi fi to check in for our flight home I was ushered into their business centre and provided with the use of a computer and a printer. This was very much appreciated. Our room was very nice with all the fittings you would expect and overlooked their swimming pool. This is on the fourth level I believe and is surrounded on three sides by the various wings of the hotel building an adjacent building. On the same level as the pool is their hospitality room which they provide for persons arriving early or departing late as was our case coming of the cruise. The breakfast room is on an elevated area on the ground floor adjacent to reception. The meal we had there was reasonable but not startling. I am not sure if dinner was available there also or they had a separate restaurant. The location of the hotel was not a central as it could have been. While we were able to walk to the botanical gardens and back from there it was taxing in the heat. Overall I would prefer to Hotel Jen Orchard Gateway where we stayed prior to the cruise and which iIhave separately reviewed.

Worth the price for a club room fantastic staff. Signature room was well appointed and comfortable and the included benefits makes it excellent value for money. Pool and gym facilities are well equipped and clean. The breakfast afternoon tea canape spread provided in the club lounge while not extensive is of good quality. All of the staff that we dealt with were helpful incl. room attendants room service laundry and club lounge. A group of us were staying here for a wedding nearby and Ian and his team at reception were fantastic in helping us sort out a few issues. He even arranged for someone to retrieve some items we left behind at the reception venue. This level of service particularly in a large hotel really sets the Orchard Hotel apart from the many similar hotels in the area. The only very minor thing I can think of is that there is no bathroom in gym. There is only a single toilet for both gym and pool areas.

Fantastic customer service and wonderful hotel. I stayed here with my wife for one night before boarding a 12 night cruise. We booked the hotel many months previous and I mentioned it was to celebrate my 50th birthday earlier that your. They must have made a note of it as room service brought up a beautiful cake and card for my belated birthday. What a lovely touch. The hotel is in a great spot if you like shopping our room was very spacious and the hotel is spotless. We booked breakfast which was plentiful but a word of warning for UK vistors obviously this hotel is aimed at the Asian market so tables are very close together and I mean close also the although the hotel does try and accommodate British tastes the food is mainly Asian. I would definitely stay at this hotel again and would recommend it to anyone.

The drinks in the bar where very expensive 450 for two beers I think that is just rediculaus. The drinks in the bar where very expensive to much 450 for 2 beers. The mini bar prices are just not realistic. The normal class people who are on holiday can not afford those prices.

So close to Orchard rd. If you want to be close but not right in amongst it The Orchard Hotel Singapore is a great destination. Perfectly located up the top end of Orchard the closest train station was an easy slow paced 10 minutes away. Making it a great location to explore. The staff were wonderful and very friendly. The advice we got was helpful and they always followed through with requests. The basic rooms are very basic and a little tired looking but the Signature rooms have personality and style and remind you yes you are in Singapore. really lovely and worth it. Dining. Breakfast was fresh and had a great selection of different cuisines. So too the buffet. We usually avoid the buffet at all cost but this one was great. The pool is simple but the kids were grateful for the oversized floating animals to play on.
Visited hua ting restaurant.

Great location but the hotel was a little dated. The breakfast buffet was not great though. They cook in bulk so by the time you eat it it is either cold andor rock hard. Staff were pleasant. Would probably stay here again but would not bother with breakfast. There are plenty of nice breakfast places nearby.
Good live music and bar. Easy and cooperative staff.
Wonderful. Location excellent buffet breakfast.

Convenient and good breakfast. We stayed for 5 nights with 2 young kids 2 yrs old and 7 month old. The hotel is conveniently situated towards one end of Orchard Rd so it is an easy stroll or bus trip down Orchard Rd. Only a few minutes walk to the bus stop and there is a shortcut through the hotel into the shopping centre which has a supermarket and a few restaurants. We stayed in a club king room. It was large enough to fit 2 cots. Bathroom had a bathtub and separate shower. Overall the room was comfy and adequate for the 4 of us. Generally clean and bath tub was low enough for me to bathe our kids. The only problem was we were close to the lifts and opposite a service room so it would be quite noisy sometimes. Buffet breakfast had a good selection of western and asian food and food quality was above average. It was hard not to eat too much. Only downside was that it was often quite busy even during weekdays and so it was quite a hectic atmosphere. Getting there before 9 am would be best. Hotel staff were friendly and helpful. They happily set up 2 cots for us in our room when we requested it at check in. And staff were friendly with our kids. We were also assisted quickly at check in as there was quite a long line and a staff member saw us with 2 young kids which was nice. Having access to the club was nice. We mainly went in the afternoon when they had afternoon tea which had a small but nice selection of desserts and finger food. During other times you could have tea coffee or soft drinks. We did not get a change to go during breakfast or cocktail hour but definitely a good perk to have access to the club. I had recommended staying at this hotel for its convenience good service and good breakfast.

Fabulous rooms great lobby amazing complimentary breakfast buffet good concierge service all in a great location. I love everything about this hotel. I just wish it were a bit cheaper. But good things do come with a price tag. So no complains.

Strategic location and Nice breakfast. The hotel is clean and the staff are friendly. Breakfast is great and the location is very convenience. Many shops malls and rstaurants within walking distance and MRT station within 10 minutes walk.

Good location. Nice hotel clean and The location is very convenience. Many shops malls and restaurants within walking distance and Metro station within 10 minutes walk. The staff are friendly Special Thanks to Mr Aeriz in frontdesk.

Excellent location. A good hotel in an excellent location. Although some distance from central Singapore it is well positioned for transport connections quality shopping and restaurants. Parking available underground. The Big Bus hop on hop off stops right outside so very convenient for tourists. This modern hotel is well presented even providing a door man to welcome you. A large lobby with a coffee lounge bar and restaurant welcome you with direct under cover access to a small shopping area. Large clean rooms with international tv stations but surprisingly no BC channel.
Nice quiet stay for the weekend. a good spread for breakfast and very prompt service. Location is amazing too. a short walk away to the start of the shopping beltal is good.

Excellent. We had very courteous service great food conveniently located and superb communication with staff in organizing our arrival for meet and greet at the airport. The buffet breakfast is wonderful and the service staff could not have been more attentive to our comfort after a 21 hour flight.

This is a Best in Class hotel in a great location in Singapore. Despite the virus. this hotel made sure our stay was a happy and healthy one. All precautions were taken upon check in. The staff was courteous and professional at all times. They made sure our needs were met at every step of the way. A shout out goes to Choi Yen for excellent service and a memorable stay. The Orchard Hotel was in a great and convenient location. It was walking distance to all the malls grocery stores and restaurants. In fact the bus stop was right around the corner. The metro was just a couple blocks away.
